alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Hardin (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 14 at 7:39PM CDT until May 14 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Hardin County in southern Illinois... Central Gallatin County in southern Illinois... North central Crittenden County in western Kentucky... Union County in northwestern Kentucky... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 738 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ridgway, or just northwest of Shawneetown, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Morganfield, Sturgis, Shawneetown, Breckinridge Center, Ridgway, Old Shawneetown and Junction. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
